words.definition: A machine used in the house.
words.example: A washing machine is a home appliance.

words.definition: A large bowl for washing things.
words.example: He washed his face in the basin.

words.definition: A tool used for sweeping floors.
words.example: Use the broom to sweep the kitchen.

words.definition: A small insect that becomes a butterfly.
words.example: The caterpillar ate a green leaf.

words.definition: Furniture used to store food or dishes.
words.example: Put the plates in the cupboard.

words.definition: Easy to break or damage.
words.example: The flower is very delicate.

words.definition: To come out of something.
words.example: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.

words.definition: A condition that makes things difficult.
words.example: His lack of experience was a handicap.

words.definition: A curved object used to hang things.
words.example: Hang your coat on the hook.

words.definition: To jump on one foot.
words.example: The rabbit hopped across the field.

words.definition: Clothes that need to be washed.
words.example: I have a lot of laundry to do today.

words.definition: To follow or try to catch someone.
words.example: The police pursued the criminal.

words.definition: Not wanting to do something.
words.example: He was reluctant to go to the party.

words.definition: The part of a shirt that covers the arm.
words.example: My shirt has long sleeves.

words.definition: The bones in the back.
words.example: The spine supports the human body.

words.definition: A dirty mark that is hard to clean.
words.example: There is a coffee stain on my shirt.

words.definition: A long, narrow piece of something.
words.example: He cut the paper into strips.

words.definition: To promise that something is true.
words.example: I swear that I am telling the truth.

words.definition: To move back and forth.
words.example: The kids like to swing in the park.

words.definition: To use something for a purpose.
words.example: We should utilize new technology.
